MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY20 postcode area of Machynlleth, affecting properties in Aberhosan and surrounding areas. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing investigations to the electrical cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.06PM on 20th October 2020.
